# ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.enabled

**Case**

An option to enable personalization features in the view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
case enabled
```

## Getting the policy

- **ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.automatic**: An option to choose the most appropriate personalization behavior.
- **ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.disabled**: An option to disable personalization features in the view controller.
